statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT meter_id, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY consumption_kwh DESC;
SELECT AVG(consumption_kwh) FROM EnergyConsumptionData;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE meter_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC, consumption_kwh ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT meter_id, SUM(consumption_kwh) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY meter_id ORDER BY total_consumption DESC
SELECT AVG(consumption_kwh) AS average_consumption, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp) AS month FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY month ORDER BY month
SELECT meter_id, SUM(consumption_kwh) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionData GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_consumption > 1000 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC
SELECT timestamp, consumption_kwh FROM EnergyConsumptionData WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) = 2022 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT meter_id, date_time, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT location, longitude, latitude FROM meter_location ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(consumption) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date_time DESC, consumption ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_consumption > 100 ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT e.meter_id, e.consumption, m.location FROM energy_consumption e JOIN meter_location m ON e.meter_id = m.meter_id WHERE m.location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY e.consumption DESC;
SELECT DATE(date_time) AS date, AVG(consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE DATE(date_time) = '2021-10-15';
SELECT SUM(e.consumption) AS total_consumption, AVG(m.longitude) AS avg_longitude, AVG(m.latitude) AS avg_latitude FROM energy_consumption e JOIN meter_location m ON e.meter_id = m.meter_id;
SELECT meter_id, location, installation_date, energy_consumption FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM smart_meters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Energy';
SELECT provider_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM energy_providers ORDER BY provider_name, phone_number;
SELECT reading_id, meter_id, timestamp, consumption FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters
SELECT meter_id, location FROM smart_meters ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Energy'
SELECT meter_id, location, installation_date, energy_consumption FROM smart_meters INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON smart_meters.meter_id = energy_consumption_data.meter_id

SELECT SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM smart_meters INNER JOIN energy_consumption_data ON smart_meters.meter_id = energy_consumption_data.meter_id GROUP BY smart_meters.meter_id ORDER BY total_consumption DESC
SELECT * FROM smart_meters
SELECT location, installation_date FROM smart_meters WHERE battery_level > 50
SELECT meter_id, reading_date, energy_consumed FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_date DESC
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_type FROM usage_patterns WHERE meter_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM meter_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2021-10-31'
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM smart_meters ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_consumed > 50 ORDER BY reading_date DESC;
SELECT meter_id, pattern_type, pattern_description FROM usage_patterns WHERE meter_id = 3;
SELECT meter_id, AVG(battery_level) AS avg_battery_level FROM smart_meters GROUP BY meter_id HAVING avg_battery_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, meter_location FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM energy_readings GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT building_id, building_name FROM buildings WHERE building_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, meter_location, installation_date FROM smart_meters WHERE meter_id = 1;
SELECT reader_name, reader_location FROM meter_readers ORDER BY reader_name ASC;
SELECT building_name, building_location FROM buildings WHERE building_location = 'New York';
SELECT meter_id, reading_time, energy_consumed FROM energy_readings ORDER BY reading_time DESC LIMIT 5;
